name: Scramble Spin A
description:
MAIN GAME

When the same symbol appears on a payline or three or more of the same symbols appear, player wins. WILD substitutes for any symbol.

Maximum wager is 80credits.

FREE SPIN

Centered WILD activates 5 free spin. During free spin, centered WILD is held.

DOUBLE DOWN

If selected reel beats dealer's, player wins double prize. 

If selected reel draws against WILD, player wins x20 prize. 

Three same symbols on player's reel pay special bonus up to 100,000.

Maximum double down wager is 5,000.

This game requires windows 10

Controls

B : bet

M : max bet

Enter : start / fast spin / rebet

W : double down game

LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT : Select a reel in double down game

C : collect

SPACE : Show odds table, big win history / Receive a bonus

I respect BONUS SPIN series by SIGMA.
